name: swiper.js
description: Free, elegant, and modern carousel without jQuery. Available for Vanilla JS and all modern frameworks like React, Vue, Angular etc...

name: splide.js
description: Splide is a lightweight, flexible, and accessible slider/carousel written in TypeScript. No dependencies, no Lighthouse errors.

name: slick.js
description: Fully responsive and super lightweight carousel in jQuery.

name: react-slick
description: Fully responsive and super lightweight carousel in React.

name: react-multi-carousel
description: Fully responsive and super lightweight carousel in React.
